ComicInfo.Characters: Ualac the Demon,Grigori Rasputin (ghost),Hellboy,Eve Sapien,Johann Kraus,Karl Kroenen,Roger the Homunculus,Lobster Smith,Abe Sapien,Lobster Johnson
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:38:06 [Issue ID 4000-437457] urn:comicvine:4000-437457 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 10:52:25. [Issue ID 1170870]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Eve opens the growling present from Hellboy, which turns out to be Ualac.
Roger convinces Hellboy to shed his pants.
When Hellboy tries to eat Baba Yaga's chicken-legged house, she turns him into a chicken.
Hellboy and Karl laugh about the fish in Johann's helmet.
Johann is nervous about going in the water. One of Eve's presents is growling.
The guests gather for Eve's party.
Hellboy and Liz dive in to head to a birthday party for Abe's sister.
ComicInfo.Title: One Pair for Two; :What are you doing, Baba?"
